Text: REhey puddin head congratulations glad to hear everything went well with the newest kuykendall im sure the sleep deprivation will pass my sis has a month old now and she gets a pretty regular nights sleep now are you back at work then who has the baby during the day i am now in porto portugal and if i ever see another glass of port again i am likely to vomit i hate the stuff anyways but we decided that since were here in porto we gotta drink some port well we spent an afternoon of tasting and the stuff never did get bearable even when we were plastered from here i am going to make my way to ireland to meet up with an old college friend and maybe even trevor if he should be so lucky ok well glad to hear everything is going well and that you are back behind the enron locomotive talk to you soon andrew tell keith i sez hello too please wrote hey you just dropping you a line from the land of motherhood i cannot believe my baby girl is already a month old little erin wasnt so little after all almost pounds yikes and no drugs either she looks just like pat its hilarious everyone says it as soon as they see her its so wonderful even i dont have the desire to go out and party anymore of course that may be partially due to total sleep deprivation which im hoping will get better in the near future as you can see you cross my mind about once every months and thats when you get an email HA anything new with you hope you are doing well give me an andrew update talk to you soon Original Message From andrew ENRON Sent Fri AM To Kuykendall Tori Cc Subject RE hey tori last night i went out to this really white trash bar called brother jimmys in new york a friend of a friend from way back happened to be there and told me he now worked for enron of course i asked if he knew anybody in the natgas dept and he said he was there with the biggest trader at enron of course i immediately looked for you or keith but it wasnt either of you hahahha anyways i think it might have been your gulf trader man but our mutual acquaintance tried to steer me away from the guy i just wanted to go over and see if he knew you guys im sure he did but when i introduced myself the dude turned out to be a huge prick none of us work for enron go away like i was some street beggar looking for some change or something reminded me of why i got out of the business in the first place what a fag wrote so glad you are still having a great time seeing the world my new goal is to work my ass off for more years and thats it retire and do what i wanna do i still talk to eric quite a bit but we havent been out lately hes still dating rachel unfortunately i think he likes it on the other side seems fairly happy as a trader i still talk to trevor all the time theres another one thats better off without the GF heforwards me the occassionaldistasteful email from you just to remind me what we miss without you around enron thinks i should onlybe able to take months off i wanted but i cant push it since pat has yet again moved into a newjob although this time not his fault he got laidoff from his last one a couple months ago nothing like being the bread winner anyway im only here for about more weeks but i plan onsending you picturesof the baby girl when she gets here take care Original Message From andrew ENRON Sent Tue AM To Kuykendall Tori Cc Subject Re hey hey nice to hear from you mrs kuykendall and nice to know that my name still comes up every now and again even if its for a chuckle at my expense still talk to sturm at all probably not so much now that youre off the bottle i dont think id know how to be social with that kid if alcohol wasnt involved message truncated Do You Yahoo Get personalized email addresses from Yahoo Mail
